title: Design - Honeycomb One Pass MVP (Revised with Walls)
response:
Feedback Summary (1 comments):

General Comments:
1. for the future reader's board, I thought we have to use same game for the ranking. everyday, provide a game, deriver, user play, ranking shown. to do so, we must be able to store playable game to DB, detect exactly same stage and reject. user can play globally played, also want to practice with instantly generated game for fun and practice.
